casebody.data:
CRAWFORD et al. v. FURY et al. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

May 28, 1900.) Action by William B. Crawford and another against John Fury and another. From a judgment in favor of plaintiffs, defendant John Fury appeals. Affirmed. Early, Heath & Stewart, for appellant. John J. Brady, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
